title: F/S - Two Trimmed T206 - you name the price
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: F/S - Two Trimmed T206 - you name the price
posts.post_content:
Trying to recoup at least some of the money on these cards.  My cost was $60; I'll consider the highest reasonable offer I receive.  My preference is to sell them as a pair, but I am willing to sell separately.  McIntyre has a sliver of the name at the top, and just a little on bottom as well.  Burch was deemed trimmed by PSA.  Both cards are crease-free:

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/mcintyre/web.jpg?ver=12822718160001[/IMG]
[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/burch/web.jpg?ver=12822718160001[/IMG]
